data.name: The Jackbox Party Pack 8 - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Hey gang, The Jackbox Party Pack 8 Soundtrack is finally here!

Unfortunately, we tried pressing all 82 tracks to vinyl and the album ended up being 27 feet wide, so we're offering it here on Bandcamp instead! We put a lot of blood, sweat, and tears into these tunes... lots and lots of tears... and now we'd love for all of those collective secretions to be yours! (Figuratively, of course. Although if you're really into actual secretions, I'm sure there's a button somewhere on this site where you can buy 'em.) Anyway, enjoy the music!

data.short_description: The Jackbox Party Pack 8 Soundtrack is here! We tried pressing all 82 tracks to vinyl but the album ended up being 27 feet wide, so we're offering it here on Steam instead! We put a lot of blood, sweat, and tears into these tunes and now we'd love those collective secretions to be yours! Enjoy!
